full_text:
Page 2357

Reporter: (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) USA Today

Question: In wake of the Epstein death, I understand that institutions across the bureau are designating specific officers to regularly monitor surveillance video in segregated housing units and other locations where inmates are at some risk for suicide. Is there someone who may be able to elaborate on this effort?

Proposed Response: (b)(5)

Internal Notes: (b)(5) (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) (b)(6); (b)(7)(C)

text_blocks.content: Question: In wake of the Epstein death, I understand that institutions across the bureau are designating specific officers to regularly monitor surveillance video in segregated housing units and other locations where inmates are at some risk for suicide. Is there someone who may be able to elaborate on this effort?

additional_notes: The document contains redactions marked as (b)(5), (b)(6), and (b)(7)(C), indicating sensitive information has been withheld.
